title: POLA X (NTSC - English subtitles hardcoded)
description:
POLA X (1999) with English subtitles 

This is a version you can burn to DVD with English subtitles already encoded.  


Based on the novel "Pierre, or The Ambiguities" by Herman Melville (1852).

Starring Yekaterina Golubeva, Catherine Deneuve, Guillaume Depardieu, Delphine Chuillot and Laurent Lucas.

Directed by Leos Carax

NTSC (29.97 frames per second) - French language (hardcoded English subtitles)

720x408 resolution
16:9 aspect ratio

MPEG-4 (Xvid) 1600 kbps from rip of 2006 Genius Entertainment DVD
Audio: AAC-HE 2 channel stereo mix

Read the book for free at <a href="
http://www.gutenberg.org/cache/epub/34970/pg34970.txt" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.gutenberg.org/cache/epub/34970/pg34970.txt</a>
